name: places/ChIJWfZX16FZwokR43kcG2jkYpI
formattedAddress: 130 E 18th St # 1M, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 130 E 18th St # 1M, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
I went to see Dr Michael Cafarella five years ago, he was my main dentist. Every time I left the office I always said to myself how great of an experience it was, from the staff to the service to the ambience. Anyways, five years ago I moved abroad, and have been to a few dentists since, and each dentist that looks at my implant always says “whoever did your back tooth did a great job.”
So I think it’s safe to say half a decade later not only do I remember Dr Cafarella’s great service, but dentists 6,000 miles away from NYC remarks on it too.

originalText.text: Dr. Cafarella is a dentist for life!!!!!!!! I had almost given up hope! Poor dental work had left my teeth in a bad state. And then, 5 years ago someone recommended  Dr. Cafarella. I'm soo sooooo grateful. He's so proficient and careful and he's genuinely one of the nicest, calmest dentists I've ever met. He won't overcharge you. Unlike some dentists. His office is humble. And I like that. I know I'm not being charged for fancy digs. I know I'm being sold something i don't need. He's an honest dentist.

And I like that. I know I'm not being charged for fancy digs. I know I'm being sold something i don't need. He's an honest dentist.

originalText.text: I had a complicated dental issue, a broken implant with the screw broken off inside it.  Dr Cafarella not only made me comfortable with what needed to be done, he did an astonishing job — winkled out the screw, removed the implant and put in a replacement, all in one visit.  My general dentist was astonished.  I’d never had to consult a Prosthodontist before — I’ll be recommending this one to others.

originalText.text: I had so many mishaps, bad implants, and over billing with this doctor. I’m doing everything over with another dentist just so I don’t have to see him again. Look around. There are better dentists

originalText.text: Terrible dentist , keeps billing my credit card for services that he didn’t do ! Be aware of your surroundings when dealing with this dentist . I wouldn’t go here unless you have no other options!
